body_text: Without spread, the second example could be written as doThings([someVal, otherVal]). It would also let users do things like doThings({ someVal, otherVal }) (ie, passing an options object instead of ordered arguments), or a simple single value doThings(someVal), neither of which would be allowed with the spread operator.
